page.title: 16Food Shopping and Eating Out
page.content: In our survey of parents at our school we found that most shopped twice or three times a week in the large supermarkets and added to this with items from the local small shops. There are many eating places for meals out- Chinese Restaurants,Curry centres,Fish and Chips shops,Steak Houses,Cafe's for quick Burgher and Chips meals and fresh cut sandwich bars. There are also several take-away shops; Chinese and Indian where you can order a meal for any number and collect it all ready for serving - hot and in silver foil.
